card.name: Misbegotten Aims
card.text: Return target creature or enchantment to its owner's hand. If that permanent's controller has eight or more cards in their graveyard, its owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library instead.

card.name: Leonin Phalanx
card.text: Vigilance Leonin Phalanx's power is equal to your devotion to white. (Each {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white.)

card.name: Spear of the Sun-Crowned
card.text: Whenever Spear of the Sun-Crowned attacks, if you control two or more enchanted creatures, it gains lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Traxian General
card.text: Lifelink When Traxian General enters, create a 0/0 white Army creature token. Put a +1/+1 counter on each Army you control.

card.name: Dedicated Charge
card.text: Enchanted creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn. Other creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Ephara's Messenger
card.text: Flying, first strike, vigilance

card.name: Zodiac Griffin
card.text: Flying Whenever you draw your second card each turn, tap target nonland permanent.

card.name: Coward-Eater
card.text: {2}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Coward-Eater. Draw a card.

card.name: Skophos Trainee
card.text: Menace Whenever your Champion attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Clash of the Titans
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast if the creature you control it targets has power 4 or greater. Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It deals damage to another target creature equal to its power.

card.name: Soul-Guide Lantern
card.text: When Soul-Guide Lantern enters, exile target card from a graveyard. {T}, Sacrifice Soul-Guide Lantern: Exile each opponent's graveyard. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Soul-Guide Lantern: Draw a card.

card.name: Bringer of Heliod's Light
card.text: Flying When Bringer of Heliod's Light enters, you may bless target creature. (Create a token copy of this creature's blessing attached to that permanent.) --- (Back): Blinded by Divinity

card.name: Blinded by Divinity
card.text: (You may also cast this side from your hand.) Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block. --- (Front): Bringer of Heliod's Light

card.name: Life Begins Anew
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast if you attacked with a legendary creature this turn. Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.

card.name: Ashlands Phoenix
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever you cast a spell that targets a creature you control, you may return Ashlands Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Momentary Petrification
card.text: Tap up to two target creatures. Put a stun counter on each of them. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)

card.name: Archon of the Legion
card.text: Flying Favored (At the beginning of your combat, you may have a nonlegendary creature you control get +1/+1 and become legendary and named "The Champion.") Whenever your Champion attacks, create a 0/0 white Army creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on each Army you control.

card.name: Fall of Olantin
card.text: Destroy all creatures.

card.name: Nikon's Aegis
card.text: Enchant creature you control All damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to enchanted creature instead. If a source would deal damage to enchanted creature, if you control three or more enchantments, prevent 1 of that damage.

card.name: Deception's Edge
card.text: You may cast this spell as though it had flash by sacrificing a creature in addition to its other costs. If you do, when it enters, attach it to target creature you control. Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card." Equip—Pay 2 life.

card.name: Eventide Coronet
card.text: Enchant creature with another Aura attached to it Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has trample, vigilance, and reach.

card.name: Tymaret, Bane of Phenax
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a non-Zombie creature. Whenever a player sacrifices a creature, Tymaret, Bane of Phenax deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Weapon TRX
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+1. Equip {2}

card.text: {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Grim Physician
card.text: When Grim Physician dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Dragon TRX
card.text: Flying

card.name: Charging Brightmare
card.text: {3}{W}, Exile Charging Brightmare from your graveyard: Bless target creature. Activate only as a sorcery. (Create a token copy of this creature's blessing attached to that permanent.) --- (Back): Blessings of the Flock

card.name: Blessings of the Flock
card.text: (You may also cast this side from your hand.) Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying. Whenever enchanted creature dies, create a 2/2 white Pegasus creature token with flying. --- (Front): Charging Brightmare

card.name: Callaphe the Mariner
card.text: Callaphe the Mariner can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater. Whenever Callaphe deals combat damage to a player, you get an experience counter. Then if you have three or more experience counters, bless target player. (Create a token copy of this creature's blessing attached to that permanent.) --- (Back): Blessing of the Sea

card.name: Blessing of the Sea
card.text: (You may also cast this side from your hand.) Enchant player Enchanted player may cast blue spells with mana value less than or equal to their devotion to blue without paying their mana costs. (Each {U} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to blue.) --- (Front): Callaphe the Mariner

card.name: Lurking Vyrkolakas
card.text: Whenever Lurking Vyrkolakas attacks, exile target card from a graveyard. If a nonland card was exiled this way, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. If a land card was exiled this way, this creature gains lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Arena Champion
card.text: Trample Whenever Arena Champion attacks, create a Weapon token, then attach it to an attacking creature you control. (It's an Equipment artifact with equip {2} and "Equipped creature gets +1/+1.")

card.name: Belief-Belying Beast
card.text: At the beginning of combat of your turn, Belief-Belying Beast gains flying until end of turn if you control a creature with flying. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, and vigilance.

card.name: Pegasus TRX
card.text: Flying

card.name: Quality Time
card.text: Whenever you attack with exactly two creatures, draw a card. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures you control this turn.

card.name: Chrolcatos, Pidae's Founder
card.text: You may cast this spell without paying its mana cost if your devotion to black is four or greater. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.) Deathtouch Whenever Chrolcatos deals combat damage to player, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Karda's Legacy
card.text: As Karda's Legacy enters, choose Iroas or Mogis. • Iroas — Whenever you attack, create a 2/1 red Soldier creature token that's tapped and attacking. • Mogis — Whenever a nontoken creature you control enters or dies, Karda's Legacy deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Menelaia, Beloved Lyrist
card.text: When Menelaia, Beloved Lyrist enters, put a +1/+1 counter on up to two target creatures. {1}, Remove a counter from another creature you control: Tap that creature. It gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Tide's Ire
card.text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, put X depth counters on Tide's Ire, where X is that spell's mana value. Remove ten depth counters from Tide's Ire: Create an 8/8 blue Kraken creature token. Remove thirty depth counters from Tide's Ire: Create Tromokratis, a legendary 20/20 blue Kraken creature token with trample and hexproof.

card.name: Ephara's Judgment
card.text: Choose one. If your devotion to white is three or greater, you may choose another. The same is true for devotion to blue. • Counter target spell. • Target player draws a card. • Target player gains 4 life.

card.name: Phenax's Judgment
card.text: Choose one. If your devotion to blue is three or greater, you may choose another. The same is true for devotion to black. • Target player mills eight cards. • You gain 1 life for each card type among cards in your opponents' graveyards. • Draw a card.

card.name: Mogis's Judgment
card.text: Choose one. If your devotion to black is three or greater, you may choose another. The same is true for devotion to red. • Create two tapped Treasure tokens. • Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. • Choose a nonland permanent type. Each opponent sacrifices a permanent of that type.

card.name: Klothys's Judgment
card.text: Choose one. If your devotion to green is three or greater, you may choose another. The same is true for devotion to red. • Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. • Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. • Klothys's Judgment deals 3 damage to target player.

card.name: Karametra's Judgment
card.text: Choose one. If your devotion to green is three or greater, you may choose another. The same is true for devotion to white. • Permanents you control gain hexproof until end of turn. • Create a token that's a copy of an Aura you control. • Each opponent sacrifices a creature with power 4 or greater.

card.name: Athreos's Judgment
card.text: Choose one. If your devotion to white is three or greater, you may choose another. The same is true for devotion to black. • Each opponent loses 4 life and you gain 4 life. • Destroy all creatures with mana value 3 or less. • Return up to two creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Keranos's Judgment
card.text: Choose one. If your devotion to blue is three or greater, you may choose another. The same is true for devotion to red. • Return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. • Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. • Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Pharika's Judgment
card.text: Choose one. If your devotion to green is three or greater, you may choose another. The same is true for devotion to black. • Create a 1/1 black Snake creature token with deathtouch. • Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. • Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn.

card.name: Iroas's Judgment
card.text: Choose one. If your devotion to red is three or greater, you may choose another. The same is true for devotion to white. • Create three 1/1 white Human creature tokens. • Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain haste until end of turn. • Opponents can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities this turn.

card.name: Kruphix's Judgment
card.text: Choose one. If your devotion to green is three or greater, you may choose another. The same is true for devotion to blue. • Create two tapped tokens that are a copy of a land you control. • Draw three cards. • Untap up to three lands you control.

card.name: Pull of Tizerus
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -X/-X, where X is your devotion to black. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)

card.name: Voyage to the Siren Sea
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and can't be blocked. {5}{U}, Exile Voyage to the Siren Sea from your graveyard or the battlefield: Draw three cards. This ability costs {1} less for each creature you control that dealt combat damage to an opponent this turn.

card.name: Unmarked Shrine TRX
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent mills a card.

card.name: Iara, Blessed-Hart
card.text: Favored (At the beginning of your combat, you may have a nonlegendary creature you control get +1/+1 and become legendary and named "The Champion.") Whenever Iara, Blessed-Hart attacks, Iara and another target attacking creature gain double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Trinity of Fates
card.text: The first spell you cast each turn costs {2} less to cast. The second spell you cast each turn can't be countered. Whenever you cast your third spell each turn, draw a card.

card.name: Host of the Neverending Revel
card.text: Ward—Sacrifice a permanent. (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player sacrifices a permanent.) Whenever Host of the Neverending Revel enters or attacks, each player sacrifices a nonland, nontoken permanent. For each player who doesn't, you draw a card.

card.name: Efimia of the Horse
card.text: Haste Whenever you cast a spell that targets Efimia of the Horse, create a 1/1 white Human creature token if this is the first time this ability has resolved this turn. If it's the second time, creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain haste until end of turn. If it's the third time, creatures you control gain menace until end of turn.

card.name: Evridiki, Queen of Pidae
card.text: Deathtouch Other Gorgons, Snakes, and Basilisks you control get +1/+1. Whenever a creature with deathtouch you control deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, create a Treasure token.

card.name: Claes, Shield of Karda
card.text: Whenever Claes, Shield of Karda attacks, another target attacking creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn. Whenever a planeswalker you control enters, you may exile Claes, then return him to the battlefield transformed with a number of loyalty counters on him equal to the starting loyalty of that planeswalker. --- (Back): Claes, Melded Spark

card.name: Claes, Melded Spark
card.text: --- (Front): Claes, Shield of Karda

card.name: Kynaios, Blade-Bound
card.text: Ward {1} Whenever Kynaios attacks, reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put an Aura card or a card with a Blessing from among them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
